name: SnowFighters
description:
Make snowball and Throw to the rivals!!
Snowball fight e-sports action game !!

You can choose from characters of 6 !!
They can use amazing EX weapons !!

Let's play with 4 people !!
There are also CPU battles that you can play alone !!

Let's battle!

◆Controls List


If you want to change the layout,
press F1 on your keyboard and the menu bar that appears will change it.


※You need a controller of 1 or more to play!
※Our game is recommended to be played by two or more players in real time.
※It is equipped with 1vs1 CPU mode that can be played by one person now, but in order to enjoy the game to the maximum, it is recommended that two or four people play.
